description.value:
You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.All-Around Vision]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Watchful Gaze]{Effect: Watchful Gaze}

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
